subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Danilo Gallinari scored a season-high 28 points and outplayed Tim Duncan down the stretch as the host Denver Nuggets beat the San Antonio Spurs, 112-106, on Tuesday night.
snippet: Danilo Gallinari scored a season-high 28 points and outplayed Tim Duncan down the stretch as the host Denver Nuggets beat the San Antonio Spurs, 112-106, on Tuesday night.
